speaker: President.
english: President. I would like to inform Members that Mr Barroso, President of the Commission, is obliged to leave and has therefore requested permission to bring forward his speech in order to furnish some replies and clarifications. I give him the floor now, and immediately after his speech we shall resume the debate.
original: President. I would like to inform Members that Mr Barroso, President of the Commission, is obliged to leave and has therefore requested permission to bring forward his speech in order to furnish some replies and clarifications. I give him the floor now, and immediately after his speech we shall resume the debate.
